snippet: The rival department store chains each have contracts with the home goods designer, but Macy’s said Penney was interfering with its deal.
abstract: Macy's escalates its legal battle over its agreement to sell certain Martha Stewart products exclusively, filing a lawsuit against JC Penney that accuses it of interfering with its contract with the home goods designer.
lead_paragraph: The rival department store chains each have contracts with the home goods designer, but Macy’s said Penney was interfering with its deal.

headline.seo: Macy’s Sues J.C. Penney Over Martha Stewart Deal
headline.main: J.C. Penney Is Sued Over Martha Stewart Deal
headline.print_headline: J.C. Penney Is Sued Over Martha Stewart Deal
